title: Track Awesome Healthcare Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome Healthcare (kakoni/awesome-healthcare) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: Curated list of awesome open source healthcare software, libraries, tools and resources.

items.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on May 20 - May 26, 2024
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on May 20 - May 26, 2024
items.content_text:
### Contents / Libraries

*   [Hermes (⭐187)](https://github.com/wardle/hermes) - a SNOMED CT terminology server.
*   [Metriport (⭐607)](https://github.com/metriport/metriport) - Open-source universal API for healthcare data.
items.content_html:
Contents / Libraries

  • Hermes (⭐187) - a SNOMED CT terminology server.
  • Metriport (⭐607) - Open-source universal API for healthcare data.

items.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Feb 12 - Feb 18, 2024
items.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Feb 12 - Feb 18, 2024
items.content_text:
### Contents / EHR

*   [Akello](https://akello.io) - Integrated Mental Health Infrastructure

### Contents / Frameworks

*   [Inferno](https://inferno-framework.github.io) - providing testing tools for the FHIR

### Contents / Libraries

*   [nhs-numbers (⭐11)](https://github.com/uk-fci/nhs-number) - Python package to provide utilities for NHS Numbers, including validity checks, normalisation, and generation.

### Contents / PHR

*   [Fasten Health (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/fastenhealth/fasten-onprem) - open-source, self-hosted, personal/family electronic medical record aggregator

### Contents / Telemedicine

*   [Healthcare worker at home](https://hcw-at-home.com) - ​ Open Source Telehealth software

### Contents / Research

*   [LabKey Server](https://www.labkey.com/products-services/labkey-server/) - Platform for Translational Research.
items.content_html:
Contents / EHR

  • Akello - Integrated Mental Health Infrastructure

Contents / Frameworks

  • Inferno - providing testing tools for the FHIR

Contents / Libraries

  • nhs-numbers (⭐11) - Python package to provide utilities for NHS Numbers, including validity checks, normalisation, and generation.

Contents / PHR

  • Fasten Health (⭐2.3k) - open-source, self-hosted, personal/family electronic medical record aggregator

Contents / Telemedicine

  • Healthcare worker at home - ​ Open Source Telehealth software

Contents / Research

  • LabKey Server - Platform for Translational Research.

items.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Jul 24 - Jul 30, 2023
items.summary: 17 awesome projects updated on Jul 24 - Jul 30, 2023
items.content_text:
### Contents / EHR

*   [ERPNext (⭐26k)](https://github.com/frappe/erpnext) - Modules that help manage patients, appointments, consultations, lab tests, and billing.
*   [HOSxP](https://hosxp.net/wordpress/) - Thai Hospital Information System that aims to ease the healthcare workflow of health centers and central hospitals.

### Contents / Specifications

*   [Continuity of Care Document](https://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=7) - Continuity of Care Document specifications
*   [DICOM Standards Browser](https://dicom.innolitics.com/ciods) - Provides an effective way to learn the DICOM standard and inspect DICOM attributes.
*   [HL7 Version 2](https://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=185) - Specifications for all versions of HL7v2
*   [OHDSI OMOP Common Data Model](https://www.ohdsi.org/data-standardization/) - Standardized data model for many healthcare concepts, awesome Github presence including scripts for many major relational databases.

### Contents / Laboratory

*   [OpenELIS](https://openelis-global.org) - Laboratory Information System for Global Health.

### Contents / Applications

*   [Simple](https://github.com/simpledotorg/) - For clinicians to track patients with high blood pressure.

### Contents / Books

*   [Inspired EHRs (⭐128)](https://github.com/goinvo/EHR) - Ideas, designs, and techniques for designing an Electronic Health Record (EHR).

### Contents / Data

*   [EDS\_NLP (⭐125)](https://github.com/aphp/edsnlp) - provides a set of spaCy components to extract information from clinical notes written in French
*   [eds-scikit (⭐40)](https://github.com/aphp/eds-scikit) - a tool to assist data scientists working on the AP-HP's Clinical Data Warehouse. It is specifically targeted for OMOP-standardized data.

### Contents / Design

*   [Determinants of Health (⭐86)](https://github.com/goinvo/HealthDeterminants) - Determinants of Health Visualization.
*   [Health Icons (⭐719)](https://github.com/resolvetosavelives/healthicons) - A collection of open source icons for public health projects.

### Contents / Machine learning

*   [MedicalGPT (⭐4k)](https://github.com/shibing624/MedicalGPT/blob/main/README_EN.md) - Training Your Own Medical GPT Model with ChatGPT Training Pipeline.
*   [MONAI (⭐6.6k)](https://github.com/Project-MONAI/MONAI) - AI Toolkit for Healthcare Imaging.
*   [PyHealth (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/sunlabuiuc/PyHealth) - A Deep Learning Python Toolkit for Healthcare Application.

### Contents / Logistics

*   [OpenBoxes (⭐737)](https://github.com/openboxes/openboxes) - an Open Source Inventory and Supply Chain Management System.
items.content_html:
Contents / EHR

  • ERPNext (⭐26k) - Modules that help manage patients, appointments, consultations, lab tests, and billing.
  • HOSxP - Thai Hospital Information System that aims to ease the healthcare workflow of health centers and central hospitals.

Contents / Specifications

  • Continuity of Care Document - Continuity of Care Document specifications
  • DICOM Standards Browser - Provides an effective way to learn the DICOM standard and inspect DICOM attributes.
  • HL7 Version 2 - Specifications for all versions of HL7v2
  • OHDSI OMOP Common Data Model - Standardized data model for many healthcare concepts, awesome Github presence including scripts for many major relational databases.

Contents / Laboratory

  • OpenELIS - Laboratory Information System for Global Health.

Contents / Applications

  • Simple - For clinicians to track patients with high blood pressure.

Contents / Books

  • Inspired EHRs (⭐128) - Ideas, designs, and techniques for designing an Electronic Health Record (EHR).

Contents / Data

  • EDS_NLP (⭐125) - provides a set of spaCy components to extract information from clinical notes written in French
  • eds-scikit (⭐40) - a tool to assist data scientists working on the AP-HP's Clinical Data Warehouse. It is specifically targeted for OMOP-standardized data.

Contents / Design

  • Determinants of Health (⭐86) - Determinants of Health Visualization.
  • Health Icons (⭐719) - A collection of open source icons for public health projects.

Contents / Machine learning

  • MedicalGPT (⭐4k) - Training Your Own Medical GPT Model with ChatGPT Training Pipeline.
  • MONAI (⭐6.6k) - AI Toolkit for Healthcare Imaging.
  • PyHealth (⭐1.2k) - A Deep Learning Python Toolkit for Healthcare Application.

Contents / Logistics

  • OpenBoxes (⭐737) - an Open Source Inventory and Supply Chain Management System.

items.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Dec 05 - Dec 11, 2022
items.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Dec 05 - Dec 11, 2022
items.content_text:
### Contents / EHR

*   [Medplum (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/medplum/medplum) - Developer platform that enables flexible and rapid development of healthcare apps.

### Contents / Imaging

*   [Omero (⭐211)](https://github.com/ome/openmicroscopy) - open source client/server system written in Java for visualizing, managing, and annotating microscope images and metadata
*   [OpenSlide (⭐440)](https://github.com/openslide/openslide) - is a C library for reading whole slide image files.
*   [Viv (⭐313)](https://github.com/hms-dbmi/viv) - multiscale visualization of high-resolution multiplexed bioimaging data on the web.

### Contents / Libraries

*   [Rust FHIR (⭐16)](https://github.com/itsbalamurali/rust-fhir) - Rust SDK for HL7 FHIR

### Contents / Data

*   [Cedar (⭐8)](https://github.com/mitre/cedar) - Open source tool for testing the strength of Electronic Clinical Quality Measure.
items.content_html:
Contents / EHR

  • Medplum (⭐1.7k) - Developer platform that enables flexible and rapid development of healthcare apps.

Contents / Imaging

  • Omero (⭐211) - open source client/server system written in Java for visualizing, managing, and annotating microscope images and metadata
  • OpenSlide (⭐440) - is a C library for reading whole slide image files.
  • Viv (⭐313) - multiscale visualization of high-resolution multiplexed bioimaging data on the web.

Contents / Libraries

  • Rust FHIR (⭐16) - Rust SDK for HL7 FHIR

Contents / Data

  • Cedar (⭐8) - Open source tool for testing the strength of Electronic Clinical Quality Measure.

items.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Aug 09 - Aug 15, 2021
items.summary: 7 awesome projects updated on Aug 09 - Aug 15, 2021
items.content_text:
### Contents / Imaging

*   [DICOMcloud (⭐229)](https://github.com/DICOMcloud/DICOMcloud) - A standalone DICOMweb server with RESTful implementation of the DICOMweb/WADO services.
*   [DICOM Server (⭐484)](https://github.com/microsoft/dicom-server) - OSS Implementation of DICOMweb standard.
*   [Fiji](https://imagej.net/software/fiji/) - Open-source platform for biological-image analysis.

### Contents / Frameworks

*   [FHIR Proxy (⭐73)](https://github.com/microsoft/fhir-proxy) - secure application that acts as an intermediary in the transfer of FHIR data to and from Azure API.
*   [FHIR Works on AWS (⭐300)](https://github.com/awslabs/fhir-works-on-aws-deployment) - FHIR Works on AWS deployment.

### Contents / Integration

*   [FHIR Converter (⭐461)](https://github.com/microsoft/FHIR-Converter) - an open source project that enables conversion of health data from legacy formats to FHIR.

### Contents / Data

*   [OpenSAFELY](https://www.opensafely.org) - Secure analytics platform for Electronic Health Records in the NHS.
items.content_html:
Contents / Imaging

  • DICOMcloud (⭐229) - A standalone DICOMweb server with RESTful implementation of the DICOMweb/WADO services.
  • DICOM Server (⭐484) - OSS Implementation of DICOMweb standard.
  • Fiji - Open-source platform for biological-image analysis.

Contents / Frameworks

  • FHIR Proxy (⭐73) - secure application that acts as an intermediary in the transfer of FHIR data to and from Azure API.
  • FHIR Works on AWS (⭐300) - FHIR Works on AWS deployment.

Contents / Integration

  • FHIR Converter (⭐461) - an open source project that enables conversion of health data from legacy formats to FHIR.

Contents / Data

  • OpenSAFELY - Secure analytics platform for Electronic Health Records in the NHS.

items.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Apr 12 - Apr 18, 2021
items.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Apr 12 - Apr 18, 2021
items.content_text:
### Contents / EHR

*   [HospitalRun](https://hospitalrun.io) - Helps provide the most modern Hospital Information System possible to the least resourced environments.

### Contents / Imaging

*   [Cornerstone (⭐2.1k)](https://github.com/cornerstonejs/cornerstone) - Open source project with a goal to deliver a complete web based medical imaging platform.
*   [Drishti (⭐193)](https://github.com/nci/drishti/wiki) - Tomography and electron-microscopy data visualizer for both scientists and lay people.

### Contents / Frameworks

*   [CareKit (⭐2.5k)](https://github.com/carekit-apple/CareKit/) - Open source software framework for creating apps that help people better understand and manage their health.

### Contents / Libraries

*   [Evil-DICOM (⭐183)](https://github.com/rexcardan/Evil-DICOM) - C# DICOM Library.
*   [Python SMART on FHIR client (⭐646)](https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/client-py) - Flexible Python client for FHIR servers supporting the SMART on FHIR protocol.

### Contents / Applications

*   [Intervention Engine (⭐32)](https://github.com/intervention-engine/ie) - Provides a web-application for data-driven team huddles.

### Contents / Datasets

*   [Medical Data for Machine Learning (⭐5.9k)](https://github.com/beamandrew/medical-data) - Curated list of medical data for machine learning.
items.content_html:
Contents / EHR

  • HospitalRun - Helps provide the most modern Hospital Information System possible to the least resourced environments.

Contents / Imaging

  • Cornerstone (⭐2.1k) - Open source project with a goal to deliver a complete web based medical imaging platform.
  • Drishti (⭐193) - Tomography and electron-microscopy data visualizer for both scientists and lay people.

Contents / Frameworks

  • CareKit (⭐2.5k) - Open source software framework for creating apps that help people better understand and manage their health.

Contents / Libraries

  • Evil-DICOM (⭐183) - C# DICOM Library.
  • Python SMART on FHIR client (⭐646) - Flexible Python client for FHIR servers supporting the SMART on FHIR protocol.

Contents / Applications

  • Intervention Engine (⭐32) - Provides a web-application for data-driven team huddles.

Contents / Datasets

  • Medical Data for Machine Learning (⭐5.9k) - Curated list of medical data for machine learning.

items.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Apr 05 - Apr 11, 2021
items.summary: 18 awesome projects updated on Apr 05 - Apr 11, 2021
items.content_text:
### Contents / EHR

*   [Bahmni](https://www.bahmni.org) - Electronic Medical Record and hospital system.
*   [EHRBase](https://ehrbase.org) OpenEHR Clinical Data Repository.
*   [EHRServer (⭐193)](https://github.com/ppazos/cabolabs-ehrserver) - CaboLabs EHRServer.
*   [OSCAR EMR](https://bitbucket.org/oscaremr/oscar) - OSCAR McMaster Project.

### Contents / Specifications

*   [OpenEHR](https://www.openehr.org) - Open specification upon which software can be built.

### Contents / Imaging

*   [OHIF (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/OHIF/Viewers) - OHIF zero-footprint DICOM viewer and oncology specific Lesion Tracker.

### Contents / Dental

*   [Open Dental](https://www.opendental.com) - Dental Practice Management Software.

### Contents / Frameworks

*   [API Server (⭐108)](https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/api-server) - FHIR Server to support patient- and clinician-facing apps.
*   [Clinical Meteor project](https://github.com/clinical-meteor) - Meteor for FDA, HIPAA, and HL7 compliant applications.

### Contents / Libraries

*   [Archie (⭐54)](https://github.com/openehr/archie) - OpenEHR Library written in Java.
*   [DCMTK](https://dicom.offis.de/dcmtk.php.en) - DICOM Toolkit.
*   [dicom (⭐1k)](https://github.com/suyashkumar/dicom) - High Performance DICOM Medical Image Parser in GoLang.
*   [Fellow Oak DICOM (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/fo-dicom/fo-dicom) - DICOM for .NET, .NET Core, Universal Windows, Android, iOS, Mono, and Unity.
*   [FHIR protocol buffers (⭐884)](https://github.com/google/fhir) - A Google implementation of protocol buffers for FHIR.
*   [php-fhir (⭐134)](https://github.com/dcarbone/php-fhir) - Tools for creating PHP classes from the HL7 FHIR Specification.
*   [pynetdicom (⭐542)](https://github.com/pydicom/pynetdicom) - A Python implementation of the DICOM networking protocol.

### Contents / Machine learning

*   [Healthcare.ai](https://healthcare.ai) - Python and R tools for healthcare machine learning.

### Contents / Logistics

*   [OpenLMIS](https://openlmis.org) - Open source, web-based, electronic logistics management information system (LMIS) software, purpose-built to manage health commodity supply chains.
items.content_html:
Contents / EHR

  • Bahmni - Electronic Medical Record and hospital system.
  • EHRBase OpenEHR Clinical Data Repository.
  • EHRServer (⭐193) - CaboLabs EHRServer.
  • OSCAR EMR - OSCAR McMaster Project.

Contents / Specifications

  • OpenEHR - Open specification upon which software can be built.

Contents / Imaging

  • OHIF (⭐3.7k) - OHIF zero-footprint DICOM viewer and oncology specific Lesion Tracker.

Contents / Dental

  • Open Dental - Dental Practice Management Software.

Contents / Frameworks

  • API Server (⭐108) - FHIR Server to support patient- and clinician-facing apps.
  • Clinical Meteor project - Meteor for FDA, HIPAA, and HL7 compliant applications.

Contents / Libraries

  • Archie (⭐54) - OpenEHR Library written in Java.
  • DCMTK - DICOM Toolkit.
  • dicom (⭐1k) - High Performance DICOM Medical Image Parser in GoLang.
  • Fellow Oak DICOM (⭐1.1k) - DICOM for .NET, .NET Core, Universal Windows, Android, iOS, Mono, and Unity.
  • FHIR protocol buffers (⭐884) - A Google implementation of protocol buffers for FHIR.
  • php-fhir (⭐134) - Tools for creating PHP classes from the HL7 FHIR Specification.
  • pynetdicom (⭐542) - A Python implementation of the DICOM networking protocol.

Contents / Machine learning

  • Healthcare.ai - Python and R tools for healthcare machine learning.

Contents / Logistics

  • OpenLMIS - Open source, web-based, electronic logistics management information system (LMIS) software, purpose-built to manage health commodity supply chains.

items.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Jan 04 - Jan 10, 2021
items.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Jan 04 - Jan 10, 2021
items.content_text:
### Contents / Imaging

*   [InVesalius](https://invesalius.github.io) - Open source software for reconstruction of computed tomography and magnetic ressonance images.

### Contents / Libraries

*   [FHIR .NET API (⭐883)](https://github.com/FirelyTeam/firely-net-sdk) - The official .NET API for HL7 FHIR.
*   [HAPI FHIR (⭐2.2k)](https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir) - Java API for HL7 FHIR Clients and Servers.

### Contents / Asset Management

*   [Tapirx (⭐31)](https://github.com/virtalabs/tapirx) - Networked medical device discovery and identification.

### Contents / Logistics

*   [ID3C (⭐22)](https://github.com/seattleflu/id3c) - Data logistics system enabling real-time genomic epidemiology.
items.content_html:
Contents / Imaging

  • InVesalius - Open source software for reconstruction of computed tomography and magnetic ressonance images.

Contents / Libraries

  • FHIR .NET API (⭐883) - The official .NET API for HL7 FHIR.
  • HAPI FHIR (⭐2.2k) - Java API for HL7 FHIR Clients and Servers.

Contents / Asset Management

  • Tapirx (⭐31) - Networked medical device discovery and identification.

Contents / Logistics

  • ID3C (⭐22) - Data logistics system enabling real-time genomic epidemiology.

items.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Oct 12 - Oct 18, 2020
items.summary: 25 awesome projects updated on Oct 12 - Oct 18, 2020
items.content_text:
### Contents / EHR

*   [GNU Health](https://www.gnuhealth.org) - Electronic Medical Record, Hospital Management, and Health Information System.
*   [FreeMedForms EMR](https://freemedforms.com/fr/start) - Electronic Medical Record software.
*   [LibreHealth EHR](https://librehealth.io/projects/lh-ehr/) - Clinically-focused Electronic Health Record System.
*   [OpenClinic (⭐37)](https://github.com/jact/openclinic) - Medical Records System.
*   [OpenEMR](https://www.open-emr.org) - Electronic Health Records and Medical Practice Management application.
*   [OpenEyes](https://openeyes.apperta.org) - Electronic Medical Record application for ophthalmology.
*   [OpenMRS](https://openmrs.org) - Enterprise Electronic Medical Record System platform.

### Contents / Specifications

*   [Open mHealth](https://www.openmhealth.org) - Open Standard For Mobile Health Data.
*   [SMART on FHIR](https://docs.smarthealthit.org/) - Open standards based technology platform.

### Contents / Imaging

*   [dcm4che](https://www.dcm4che.org/) - Clinical Image and Object Management.
*   [Horos](https://horosproject.org) - Medical image viewer.
*   [LibreHealth Radiology](https://librehealth.io/projects/lh-radiology/) - Customized version of LibreHealth Toolkit with additional tools for radiology and imaging professionals.
*   [OpenREM](https://openrem.org/) - Radiation Exposure Monitoring for physicists.
*   [Orthanc](https://www.orthanc-server.com) - Lightweight DICOM server for healthcare and medical research.
*   [VTK](https://vtk.org) - 3 dimensional visualization toolkit supporting a variety of algorithms and modeling techniques.

### Contents / Dental

*   [OpenMolar](https://openmolar.com/) - Dental Practice Management Software.

### Contents / Frameworks

*   [FHIRBase](https://fhirbase.github.io) - Storage based on the FHIR Standard.
*   [Opal](https://opal.openhealthcare.org.uk/) - Framework for building clinical applications.
*   [Spark (⭐271)](https://github.com/FirelyTeam/spark) - Public domain FHIR server developed in C#.

### Contents / Libraries

*   [MITK](https://www.mitk.org/wiki/The_Medical_Imaging_Interaction_Toolkit_\(MITK\)) - The Medical Imaging Interaction Toolkit.

### Contents / Integration

*   [NextGen Connect Integration Engine (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/nextgenhealthcare/connect) - The swiss army knife of healthcare integration.

### Contents / Bioinformatics

*   [Bcbio (⭐1k)](https://github.com/bcbio/bcbio-nextgen) - Validated, scalable, community developed variant calling, RNA-seq and small RNA analysis.
*   [Wregex](https://ehubio.ehu.eus/wregex/) - Amino acid motif searching software with optional Position-Specific Scoring Matrix.

### Contents / Data

*   [cTAKES](https://ctakes.apache.org/) - Natural Language Processing System for extraction of information from Electronic Medical Record clinical free-text.
*   [Snow Owl (⭐273)](https://github.com/b2ihealthcare/snow-owl) - Highly scalable, open source terminology server with revision-control capabilities and collaborative authoring platform features.

items.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Apr 17 - Apr 23, 2017
items.summary: 9 awesome projects updated on Apr 17 - Apr 23, 2017
items.content_text:
### Contents / EHR

*   [MedinTux](https://medintux.org/) - French Medical Practice Management System.
*   [Open Hospital](https://sourceforge.net/projects/openhospital/) - Electronic Medical Record software for underprivileged rural hospitals.

### Contents / Imaging

*   [3D Slicer](https://www.slicer.org) - Cross-platform application for analyzing, visualizing and understanding medical image data.
*   [ITK](https://itk.org/) - Toolkit used for the development of image segmentation and image registration programs with leading-edge algorithms in 2 and 3 dimensions.
*   [ITK-SNAP](http://www.itksnap.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php) - Interactive software for 3 dimensional image navigation, annotation, and automatic segmentation with an emphasis on user-friendliness.

### Contents / Libraries

*   [Health data standards (⭐0)](https://github.com/projectcypress/health-data-standards) - Ruby library for generating and consuming various healthcare related formats. These include HITSP C32, QRDA Category I, and QRDA Category III.

### Contents / Hardware

*   [OpenAPS](https://openaps.org/) - The Open Artificial Pancreas System project is an open and transparent effort to make safe and effective basic Artificial Pancreas System.

### Contents / Data

*   [Caisis](http://www.caisis.org/) - Oncology research software with a Patient Data Management System.
*   [Synthea Patient Generator (⭐2.6k)](https://github.com/synthetichealth/synthea) - Synthetic patient generator that models the medical history of synthetic patients.
items.content_html:
Contents / EHR

  • MedinTux - French Medical Practice Management System.
  • Open Hospital - Electronic Medical Record software for underprivileged rural hospitals.

Contents / Imaging

  • 3D Slicer - Cross-platform application for analyzing, visualizing and understanding medical image data.
  • ITK - Toolkit used for the development of image segmentation and image registration programs with leading-edge algorithms in 2 and 3 dimensions.
  • ITK-SNAP - Interactive software for 3 dimensional image navigation, annotation, and automatic segmentation with an emphasis on user-friendliness.

Contents / Libraries

  • Health data standards (⭐0) - Ruby library for generating and consuming various healthcare related formats. These include HITSP C32, QRDA Category I, and QRDA Category III.

Contents / Hardware

  • OpenAPS - The Open Artificial Pancreas System project is an open and transparent effort to make safe and effective basic Artificial Pancreas System.

Contents / Data

  • Caisis - Oncology research software with a Patient Data Management System.
  • Synthea Patient Generator (⭐2.6k) - Synthetic patient generator that models the medical history of synthetic patients.

items.title: Awesome Healthcare Updates on Mar 27 - Apr 02, 2017
items.summary: 18 awesome projects updated on Mar 27 - Apr 02, 2017
items.content_text:
### Contents / EHR

*   [Odoo Medical (⭐278)](https://github.com/OCA/vertical-medical) - Universal Health and Hospital Information System.
*   [openMAXIMS (⭐64)](https://github.com/IMS-MAXIMS/openMAXIMS) - Full Patient Administration System designed for the NHS.

### Contents / Specifications

*   [FHIR](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/) - Fast Health Interoperability Resources.

### Contents / Prescribing

*   [OpenEP (⭐20)](https://github.com/ehrscape/examples/tree/master/openep) - Suite of medicines management apps that improve the safety and efficiency of prescribing and medicines management.

### Contents / Frameworks

*   [ResearchKit (⭐5.7k)](https://github.com/ResearchKit/ResearchKit) - Software framework that makes it easy to create apps for medical research or for other research projects.

### Contents / Libraries

*   [fhir.js (⭐430)](https://github.com/FHIR/fhir.js) - JavaScript client for FHIR.
*   [Node HL7 (⭐58)](https://github.com/MatthewVita/node-hl7-complete) - Node module that is bridged with the Java Hapi HL7 library.
*   [Python HL7 (⭐295)](https://github.com/johnpaulett/python-hl7) - Simple library for parsing messages of HL7 version 2.x into Python objects.
*   [Ruby FHIR (⭐173)](https://github.com/fhir-crucible/fhir_client) - FHIR client implementation in Ruby.
*   [Ruby HL7 (⭐96)](https://github.com/segfault/ruby-hl7) - Ruby HL7 library.

### Contents / Applications

*   [SMART Pediatric Growth Chart (⭐69)](https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/growth-chart-app) - Pediatric growth charts.

### Contents / PHR

*   [Tidepool](https://github.com/tidepool-org) - Data platform to reduce the burden of Type 1 Diabetes.

### Contents / Research

*   [i2b2](https://www.i2b2.org) - Research data warehouse.

### Contents / Integration

*   [OpenHIM](http://openhim.org/) - Health information mediator.

### Contents / Hardware

*   [Gluco (⭐43)](https://github.com/nebulabio/gluco) - Glucometer.
*   [Murgen](https://hackaday.io/project/9281-murgen-open-source-ultrasound-imaging) - Ultrasound imaging development kit.

### Contents / Bioinformatics

*   [ADAM (⭐1k)](https://github.com/bigdatagenomics/adam) - Genomics analysis platform.
*   [Galaxy](https://galaxyproject.org/) - Open web-based platform for data intensive biomedical research.
